sourcesContent: import { Toast } from 'react-bootstrap' import logo from './logo2.png' const Alert = ({ show, toastText, color, handleToast }) => { return ( handleToast(false)} delay={3000} autohide style={{ position: 'fixed', bottom: 30, right: 10, width: 500, backgroundColor: `${color}` }}> System message {toastText} ) } export default Alert
